Sql.query: select ulogcodi, psiclicodi, ulogusucreacion, ulogfeccreacion, ulogproceso, ulogtablaafectada, ulognroregistrosafectados, ulogmensaje from iio_log_importacion where ulogcodi = :ulogcodi
select nvl(max(ulogcodi), 0) + 1 as correlativo from iio_log_importacion
select ulogcodi, psiclicodi, ulogusucreacion, ulogfeccreacion, ulogproceso, ulogtablaafectada, ulognroregistrosafectados, ulogmensaje from iio_log_importacion

insert into iio_log_importacion(ulogcodi, psiclicodi, ulogusucreacion, ulogfeccreacion, ulogproceso, ulogtablaafectada, ulognroregistrosafectados, ulogmensaje, rcimcodi, ulogtablacoes, ulogidregistrocoes, ulogtipoincidencia) values (:ulogcodi, :psiclicodi, :ulogusucreacion, :ulogfeccreacion, :ulogproceso, :ulogtablaafectada, :ulognroregistrosafectados, :ulogmensaje, :rcimcodi, :ulogtablacoes, :ulogidregistrocoes, :ulogtipoincidencia)

SELECT 'Existen ' || count(*) ||' registros duplicados con el código ' || osinergcodi ||' en la tabla de Equipos' as mensaje FROM eq_equipo WHERE famcodi = 45 AND osinergcodi IS NOT NULL AND equiestado IN ('A', 'B') GROUP BY osinergcodi HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
select distinct 'No se encontró el Punto de Medición para el cliente: ' || sumucodi as mensaje from iio_tmp_consumo where ptomedicodi is null
delete from iio_log_importacion where rcimcodi = :rcimcodi and psiclicodi = :psiclicodi
select ulogcodi, psiclicodi, ulogusucreacion, ulogfeccreacion, ulogproceso, ulogtablaafectada, ulognroregistrosafectados, ulogmensaje, rcimcodi from iio_log_importacion where rcimcodi = :rcimcodi

SELECT SUMI.EMPRCODI AS IDSUMINISTRADOR, SUMI.EMPRCODOSINERGMIN AS CODSUMINISTRADORSICLI, SUMI.EMPRNOMB AS SUMINISTRADORSICLI, EMCL.EMPRRUC AS RUC, EMCL.EMPRNOMB AS USUARIOLIBRE, EQ.OSINERGCODI AS CODSUMINISTRO, PTO.PTOMEDIELENOMB NOMBREPTOMEDICION, ME.MEDIFECHA AS FECHAMEDICION, H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, H6, H7, H8, H9, H10, H11, H12, H13, H14, H15, H16, H17, H18, H19, H20, H21, H22, H23, H24, H25, H26, H27, H28, H29, H30, H31, H32, H33, H34, H35, H36, H37, H38, H39, H40, H41, H42, H43, H44, H45, H46, H47, H48, H49, H50, H51, H52, H53, H54, H55, H56, H57, H58, H59, H60, H61, H62, H63, H64, H65, H66, H67, H68, H69, H70, H71, H72, H73, H74, H75, H76, H77, H78, H79, H80, H81, H82, H83, H84, H85, H86, H87, H88, H89, H90, H91, H92, H93, H94, H95, H96 ,CASE WHEN SO.ULSUMICODCIIU IS NOT NULL THEN SO.ULSUMICODCIIU||':'||CIIU.CIIUNOMBRE END AS CIIU FROM ME_MEDICION96 ME JOIN ME_PTOMEDICION PTO ON ME.PTOMEDICODI = PTO.PTOMEDICODI JOIN EQ_EQUIPO EQ ON PTO.EQUICODI = EQ.EQUICODI JOIN SI_EMPRESA EMCL ON EQ.EMPRCODI = EMCL.EMPRCODI
JOIN SI_EMPRESA SUMI ON PTO.EMPRCODI = SUMI.EMPRCODI LEFT JOIN VW_SUMIN_OSIG_USUARIO_LIBRE SO ON EQ.EQUICODI = SO.EQUICODI AND SUMI.EMPRCODOSINERGMIN =SO.ULSUMICODEMPRESA LEFT JOIN SI_CIIU CIIU ON SO.ULSUMICODCIIU = CIIU.CIIUCODIGO WHERE ME.LECTCODI = 53 AND TO_CHAR(ME.MEDIFECHA,'YYYYMM') = '{0}' AND {1} ORDER BY SUMI.EMPRNOMB, EMCL.EMPRNOMB, PTO.PTOMEDIELENOMB, ME.MEDIFECHA

SELECT EM.EMPRCODI AS IDSUMINISTRADOR, EM.EMPRCODOSINERGMIN AS CODSUMINISTRADORSICLI, EM.EMPRNOMB AS SUMINISTRADORSICLI, EMCL.EMPRRUC AS RUC, EMCL.EMPRNOMB AS USUARIOLIBRE, EQ.OSINERGCODI AS CODUSUARIOLIBRE, BR.BARRNOMBRE AS BARRASUMINISTRO, FA.UFACIDAREADEMANDA AS AREADEMANDA, FA.UFACPAGAVAD AS PAGAVAD, FA.UFACCONSENERGACTVHPPS AS CONSUMOENERGIAHP, FA.UFACCONSENERGACTVFPPS AS CONSUMOENERGIAHFP, FA.UFACMAXDEMHPPS AS MAXIMADEMANDAHP, FA.UFACMAXDEMFPPS AS MAXIMADEMANDAHFP FROM IIO_FACTURA FA LEFT JOIN EQ_EQUIPO EQ ON FA.EQUICODI = EQ.EQUICODI LEFT JOIN SI_EMPRESA EM ON FA.EMPRCODI = EM.EMPRCODI LEFT JOIN SI_EMPRESA EMCL ON EQ.EMPRCODI = EMCL.EMPRCODI LEFT JOIN PR_BARRA BR ON FA.UFACCODPUNTOSUMINISTRO = BR.BARRCODI WHERE FA.UFACMESFACTURADO = '{0}' AND {1} ORDER BY EM.EMPRNOMB, EMCL.EMPRNOMB

select ulogcodi, psiclicodi, ulogusucreacion, ulogfeccreacion, ulogproceso, ulogtablaafectada, ulognroregistrosafectados, ulogmensaje, rcimcodi, ulogtablacoes, ulogidregistrocoes, ulogtipoincidencia from iio_log_importacion where psiclicodi = {0} --and ulogtablaafectada in ({1}) and rcimcodi in ({1}) and ulogtipoincidencia = 1

SELECT SUMI.EMPRCODI AS IDSUMINISTRADOR, SUMI.EMPRCODOSINERGMIN AS CODSUMINISTRADORSICLI, SUMI.EMPRNOMB AS SUMINISTRADORSICLI, EMCL.EMPRRUC AS RUC, EMCL.EMPRNOMB AS USUARIOLIBRE, EQ.OSINERGCODI AS CODSUMINISTRO, PTO.PTOMEDIELENOMB NOMBREPTOMEDICION, PTO.PTOMEDICODI, ME.MEDIFECHA AS FECHAMEDICION, (H1 + H2 + H3 + H4 + H5 + H6 + H7 + H8 + H9 + H10 + H11 + H12 + H13 + H14 + H15 + H16 + H17 + H18 + H19 + H20 + H21 + H22 + H23 + H24 + H25 + H26 + H27 + H28 + H29 + H30 + H31 + H32 + H33 + H34 + H35 + H36 + H37 + H38 + H39 + H40 + H41 + H42 + H43 + H44 + H45 + H46 + H47 + H48 + H49 + H50 + H51 + H52 + H53 + H54 + H55 + H56 + H57 + H58 + H59 + H60 + H61 + H62 + H63 + H64 + H65 + H66 + H67 + H68 + H69 + H70 + H71 + H72 + H73 + H74 + H75 + H76 + H77 + H78 + H79 + H80 + H81 + H82 + H83 + H84 + H85 + H86 + H87 + H88 + H89 + H90 + H91 + H92 + H93 + H94 + H95 + H96) AS MEDITOTAL, H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, H6, H7, H8, H9, H10, H11, H12, H13, H14, H15, H16, H17, H18, H19, H20, H21, H22, H23, H24, H25, H26, H27, H28, H29, H30, H31, H32, H33, H34, H35, H36, H37, H38, H39, H40, H41, H42, H43, H44, H45, H46, H47, H48, H49, H50, H51, H52, H53, H54, H55, H56, H57, H58, H59, H60, H61, H62, H63, H64, H65, H66, H67, H68, H69, H70, H71, H72, H73, H74, H75, H76, H77, H78, H79, H80, H81, H82, H83, H84, H85, H86, H87, H88, H89, H90, H91, H92, H93, H94, H95, H96 ,CASE WHEN SO.ULSUMICODCIIU IS NOT NULL THEN SO.ULSUMICODCIIU||':'||CIIU.CIIUNOMBRE END AS CIIU FROM ME_MEDICION96 ME JOIN ME_PTOMEDICION PTO ON ME.PTOMEDICODI = PTO.PTOMEDICODI JOIN EQ_EQUIPO EQ ON PTO.EQUICODI = EQ.EQUICODI JOIN SI_EMPRESA EMCL ON EQ.EMPRCODI = EMCL.EMPRCODI
JOIN SI_EMPRESA SUMI ON PTO.EMPRCODI = SUMI.EMPRCODI LEFT JOIN VW_SUMIN_OSIG_USUARIO_LIBRE SO ON EQ.EQUICODI = SO.EQUICODI AND SUMI.EMPRCODOSINERGMIN =SO.ULSUMICODEMPRESA LEFT JOIN SI_CIIU CIIU ON SO.ULSUMICODCIIU = CIIU.CIIUCODIGO WHERE ME.LECTCODI = 53 AND ME.MEDIFECHA BETWEEN TO_DATE('{1}','dd/MM/yyyy') and TO_DATE('{2}','dd/MM/yyyy') AND PTO.PTOMEDICODI IN ({0}) ORDER BY SUMI.EMPRNOMB, EMCL.EMPRNOMB, PTO.PTOMEDIELENOMB, ME.MEDIFECHA

select ME.MEDIFECHA AS FECHAMEDICION, SUM(H1) AS H1,SUM(H2) AS H2,SUM(H3) AS H3,SUM(H4) AS H4,SUM(H5) AS H5, SUM(H6) AS H6,SUM(H7) AS H7,SUM(H8) AS H8,SUM(H9) AS H9,SUM(H10) AS H10, SUM(H11) AS H11,SUM(H12) AS H12,SUM(H13) AS H13,SUM(H14) AS H14,SUM(H15) AS H15, SUM(H16) AS H16,SUM(H17) AS H17,SUM(H18) AS H18,SUM(H19) AS H19,SUM(H20) AS H20, SUM(H21) AS H21,SUM(H22) AS H22,SUM(H23) AS H23,SUM(H24) AS H24,SUM(H25) AS H25, SUM(H26) AS H26,SUM(H27) AS H27,SUM(H28) AS H28,SUM(H29) AS H29,SUM(H30) AS H30, SUM(H31) AS H31,SUM(H32) AS H32,SUM(H33) AS H33,SUM(H34) AS H34,SUM(H35) AS H35, SUM(H36) AS H36,SUM(H37) AS H37,SUM(H38) AS H38,SUM(H39) AS H39,SUM(H40) AS H40, SUM(H41) AS H41,SUM(H42) AS H42,SUM(H43) AS H43,SUM(H44) AS H44,SUM(H45) AS H45, SUM(H46) AS H46,SUM(H47) AS H47,SUM(H48) AS H48,SUM(H49) AS H49,SUM(H50) AS H50, SUM(H51) AS H51,SUM(H52) AS H52,SUM(H53) AS H53,SUM(H54) AS H54,SUM(H55) AS H55, SUM(H56) AS H56,SUM(H57) AS H57,SUM(H58) AS H58,SUM(H59) AS H59,SUM(H60) AS H60, SUM(H61) AS H61,SUM(H62) AS H62,SUM(H63) AS H63,SUM(H64) AS H64,SUM(H65) AS H65, SUM(H66) AS H66,SUM(H67) AS H67,SUM(H68) AS H68,SUM(H69) AS H69,SUM(H70) AS H70, SUM(H71) AS H71,SUM(H72) AS H72,SUM(H73) AS H73,SUM(H74) AS H74,SUM(H75) AS H75, SUM(H76) AS H76,SUM(H77) AS H77,SUM(H78) AS H78,SUM(H79) AS H79,SUM(H80) AS H80, SUM(H81) AS H81,SUM(H82) AS H82,SUM(H83) AS H83,SUM(H84) AS H84,SUM(H85) AS H85, SUM(H86) AS H86,SUM(H87) AS H87,SUM(H88) AS H88,SUM(H89) AS H89,SUM(H90) AS H90, SUM(H91) AS H91,SUM(H92) AS H92,SUM(H93) AS H93,SUM(H94) AS H94,SUM(H95) AS H95, SUM(H96) AS H96 FROM ME_MEDICION96 ME JOIN ME_PTOMEDICION PTO ON ME.PTOMEDICODI = PTO.PTOMEDICODI JOIN EQ_EQUIPO EQ ON PTO.EQUICODI = EQ.EQUICODI JOIN SI_EMPRESA EMCL ON EQ.EMPRCODI = EMCL.EMPRCODI JOIN SI_EMPRESA SUMI ON PTO.EMPRCODI = SUMI.EMPRCODI LEFT JOIN VW_SUMIN_OSIG_USUARIO_LIBRE SO ON EQ.EQUICODI = SO.EQUICODI AND SUMI.EMPRCODOSINERGMIN =SO.ULSUMICODEMPRESA LEFT JOIN SI_CIIU CIIU ON SO.ULSUMICODCIIU = CIIU.CIIUCODIGO WHERE ME.LECTCODI = 53 AND TO_CHAR(ME.MEDIFECHA, 'yyyy') = '{0}' and TO_CHAR(ME.MEDIFECHA, 'MM') in ({1}) AND PTO.PTOMEDICODI IN ({2}) GROUP BY ME.MEDIFECHA ORDER BY ME.MEDIFECHA

select ME.Ptomedicodi, ME.MEDIFECHA AS FECHAMEDICION, H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, H6, H7, H8, H9, H10, H11, H12, H13, H14, H15, H16, H17, H18, H19, H20, H21, H22, H23, H24, H25, H26, H27, H28, H29, H30, H31, H32, H33, H34, H35, H36, H37, H38, H39, H40, H41, H42, H43, H44, H45, H46, H47, H48, H49, H50, H51, H52, H53, H54, H55, H56, H57, H58, H59, H60, H61, H62, H63, H64, H65, H66, H67, H68, H69, H70, H71, H72, H73, H74, H75, H76, H77, H78, H79, H80, H81, H82, H83, H84, H85, H86, H87, H88, H89, H90, H91, H92, H93, H94, H95, H96 FROM ME_MEDICION96 ME JOIN ME_PTOMEDICION PTO ON ME.PTOMEDICODI = PTO.PTOMEDICODI JOIN EQ_EQUIPO EQ ON PTO.EQUICODI = EQ.EQUICODI JOIN SI_EMPRESA EMCL ON EQ.EMPRCODI = EMCL.EMPRCODI JOIN SI_EMPRESA SUMI ON PTO.EMPRCODI = SUMI.EMPRCODI LEFT JOIN VW_SUMIN_OSIG_USUARIO_LIBRE SO ON EQ.EQUICODI = SO.EQUICODI AND SUMI.EMPRCODOSINERGMIN =SO.ULSUMICODEMPRESA LEFT JOIN SI_CIIU CIIU ON SO.ULSUMICODCIIU = CIIU.CIIUCODIGO WHERE ME.LECTCODI = 53 AND TO_CHAR(ME.MEDIFECHA, 'yyyy') = '{0}' and TO_CHAR(ME.MEDIFECHA, 'MM') in ({1}) AND PTO.PTOMEDICODI IN ({2}) ORDER BY ME.MEDIFECHA

select ME.Ptomedicodi, ME.MEDIFECHA AS FECHAMEDICION, H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, H6, H7, H8, H9, H10, H11, H12, H13, H14, H15, H16, H17, H18, H19, H20, H21, H22, H23, H24, H25, H26, H27, H28, H29, H30, H31, H32, H33, H34, H35, H36, H37, H38, H39, H40, H41, H42, H43, H44, H45, H46, H47, H48, H49, H50, H51, H52, H53, H54, H55, H56, H57, H58, H59, H60, H61, H62, H63, H64, H65, H66, H67, H68, H69, H70, H71, H72, H73, H74, H75, H76, H77, H78, H79, H80, H81, H82, H83, H84, H85, H86, H87, H88, H89, H90, H91, H92, H93, H94, H95, H96 FROM ME_MEDICION96 ME JOIN ME_PTOMEDICION PTO ON ME.PTOMEDICODI = PTO.PTOMEDICODI JOIN EQ_EQUIPO EQ ON PTO.EQUICODI = EQ.EQUICODI JOIN SI_EMPRESA EMCL ON EQ.EMPRCODI = EMCL.EMPRCODI JOIN SI_EMPRESA SUMI ON PTO.EMPRCODI = SUMI.EMPRCODI LEFT JOIN VW_SUMIN_OSIG_USUARIO_LIBRE SO ON EQ.EQUICODI = SO.EQUICODI AND SUMI.EMPRCODOSINERGMIN =SO.ULSUMICODEMPRESA LEFT JOIN SI_CIIU CIIU ON SO.ULSUMICODCIIU = CIIU.CIIUCODIGO WHERE ME.LECTCODI = 53 AND ME.MEDIFECHA BETWEEN TO_DATE('{1}', 'dd/MM/yyyy') and TO_DATE('{2}', 'dd/MM/yyyy') AND PTO.PTOMEDICODI IN ({0}) ORDER BY ME.MEDIFECHA
